ohugen prashna kirimedi athadanguwata gath chithrapata adhyakshawaraya pilibanda thorathuru heliwiya.waththala pradeshayedi ohu athadanguwata gaththe mita dina kihipayakata peraya.asis mahathage sirure atakatu eeye godagath athara ohuge gnyathin wisin ohu handunaganimata niyamithawa thibe.adhikaranayen labagath awasaraya matha ema godaganima siduwiya.madakalapuwa mahesthrathwaraya eeye (28) paswaruwe ema sthanayata paminimata niyamithawa thibuni.kolambaa disawa bara niyojya polispathi anura senanayaka kolambaa aparadha kottasaye adhyaksha polis adhikari si.aar. ranawira mahathwarunge upades saha adhikshanaya yatathe sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka hemantha dikoowita, polis parikshaka edirisuriya polis parikshaka wijerathna polis kosthapal ruwan athulu kandayamak me sambandhawa parikshana pawathwuni..

athadanguwata gath sakakaru nishchitha washayenma sorakamata sambandha bawata ho ema ran bhanda kauthukagarayen sorakam kala bawata ho thahawuru kara ganimen pasu adhikaranayata danum dena lesa kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath rashmi singappuli mahatha pawasiya.
